item.title: Real Life Pokemon on my Walk
item.description: Evolved my Ekans into a Daehreppoc. üêç Not bad, huh? But this was my luckiest catch of the day. CORONAVIRUS, I CHOOSE YOU!

item.title: Detective Pikachu Was As Good As It Could Be
item.description: In other news, I saw Detective Pikachu with the family a few days ago, and I think we all left impressed. Some strong acting and genuinely funny moments. Pikachu singing the Pok√©mon cartoon theme song was a highlight for me. But does Ryan Reynolds have to be in literally every movie now? That being said, he did a wonderful job. A really enjoyable and charming movie. Go see it. With your kids, of course.
